Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    1.0 Handles behaviors for a Tic-Tac-Toe game board.
    Author:
    David Hausken

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean[] spaceHasO
      Boolean array that keeps track of spaces with an O
      private boolean[] spaceHasX
      Boolean array that keeps track of spaces with an X
      private boolean[] spaceUsed
      Boolean array that keeps track of spaces that are used.

      • xWins

        Checks if X wins.
        Returns:

      • boardFilled

        private boolean boardFilled()
        Checks if the board is filled.
        Returns:
        Boolean representing a tie.

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver()
        Checks each of the possible endings to the game. Prints a message corresponding to the correct victory condition.
        Returns:
        boolean that determines whether the game is over or not.
